CustomField.description: CC BWRD Expected Sales Weighted Score Automatic
CustomField.formula: CASE(Expected_Sales__c , '(1) 1 Year+', 1* Expected_Sales_Weight__c, '(3) Months', 3 * Expected_Sales_Weight__c, '(4) Weeks', 4 * Expected_Sales_Weight__c, '(5) Days', 5 * Expected_Sales_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Expected Sales Cycle Weighted Score
